skill.name: Sealed Tombs
skill.description: Can be used if your Life Points are lower than your opponent's by 1000 or more. Until the end of your opponent's next turn, neither player can banish cards from the Graveyard or Special Summon monsters from the Graveyard. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.

linkedArticle.description: Everything you need to know about farming Ishizu Ishtar efficiently! Her decklists, card rewards, top level farm decks with strategy information and free to play card replacements.
linkedArticle.title: How to Farm Ishizu Ishtar

children.content: keys to duel at the gate
Ishizu Ishtar level 40 appears at the gate upon reaching stage 30
Summon LIGHT Monster(s) 200 time(s) in total.
Win 1 Duel (s) against Ishizu Ishtar at Level 30 in Duel World.
Win a Duel against Ishizu Ishatar with at least 6,000 LP remaining.

skill.name: The Tie that Binds
skill.description: Until the end of your turn, the ATK of all face-up monsters on your field increases by the number of monsters on your field times 100. This Skill can only be used once per turn.

skill.name: Destiny Draw
skill.description: Can be used when your Life Points decrease by 2000. In the Draw Phase, instead of conducting your normal draw, draw a card of your choice. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.

linkedArticle.description: Everything you need to know about farming Yami Yugi efficiently! His decklists, card rewards, top level farm decks with strategy information and free to play card replacements.
linkedArticle.title: How to Farm Yami Yugi

children.content: keys to duel at the gate
He appears at the gate at Stage 15 (unless chosen as your starting character)
Yami Yugi Level 40 appears at the gate upon reaching Stage 30
Pick as a starter character (or reach Stage 15 in DM Duel World if you choose
Use a Spell Card 5 time(s) in one Duel.
and win 1 Duel(s) against Yami Yugi at level 30 in Duel World.

skill.name: Endless Trap Hell
skill.description: Can be used when you have 3 Trap Cards in your Graveyard. Add 1 random Trap Card to your hand from your Graveyard and return 1 card to your Deck from your hand. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.
